```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(performance)

mtcars <- mtcars
```



```{r cars}
summary(mtcars)
```

# Make a model, any model

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r qsec}
qsecModel <- lm(formula = qsec ~ carb + disp, data = mtcars)

qsecModel

summary(qsecModel)
```

# Check performance

```{r qsecCheck}

performance::check_model(qsecModel)

```

Nice...
